name: Dark Lighted Soul
description:
Help a lost goddess get the parts of her soul back together!

How To Play

Arrows to move and jump, S to switch between soul parts, D to use a elemental force and F to switch forces.

The Story

As a goddess gets attacked by an evil witch, her soul gets separed in two.

Catch up to the escaping witch with elemental forces!

Other Random Things

Made for the 9th Geta Game Jam, enjoy :D

It may have some bugs, if so please tell me.
